document.full_text: muammar gaddafi has accepted a roadmap for ending the civil war in libya, south african president jacob zuma said after leading a delegation of african leaders at talks in tripoli.
document.title: gaddafi "accepts peace roadmap": south africa's zuma
lines_and_colors: muammar gaddafi has accepted a roadmap for ending the civil war in libya, south african president jacob zuma said after leading a delegation of african leaders at talks in tripoli.
